javadoc:
Represents a function tag object that can be associated with 
 functions. This maps to the {@link FunctionTagAdapter} table.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the id of the item.
@return
methods.name: getId
methods.comment: Returns the id of the item.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the name of the tag.
@param name the tag name
methods.name: setName
methods.comment: Sets the name of the tag.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the comment for this tag.
@param comment the tag comment
methods.name: setComment
methods.comment: Sets the comment for this tag.

methods.javadoc: Deletes this tag from the program.
methods.name: delete
methods.comment: Deletes this tag from the program.

name: FunctionTag
comment:
Represents a function tag object that can be associated with 
 functions. This maps to the FunctionTagAdapter table.
